articles.title: Camp Fire Contained: 88 Dead, 203 Still Missing
articles.description: Butte County Sheriff Kory Honea announced the official death toll in a statement on Monday night, with more than 200 still unaccounted for.
articles.content: Only 16 of the corpses recovered have been positively identified, but 54 have tentative identification. Of the known 16 bodies found, 13 were residents of Paradise, and all but two were senior citizens. “Unfortunately, many of the remains we’ve located have b… [+1091 chars]

articles.author: John Nolte
articles.title: Nolte: Only Anti-Science Suckers Believe Climate Change Hysteria
articles.description: How many scientific doomsday prophecies have to be debunked before I'm allowed to be skeptical of the lastest: Climate Change?
articles.content: How many? Give me a number. How about if I give you a number: Thirteen. Thirteen, y’all. I am on the dark side of 52 now, which is not young, but it also isn’t old. And yet, I have lived to see so many media and scientifically-driven end-of-the-world predicti… [+4231 chars]

articles.author: Neil Munro
articles.title: Chuck Schumer Hints at Extra Border-Wall Funding
articles.description: The Democrats' Senate leader, Chuck Schumer, suggested to reporters Tuesday that he could endorse spending more than $1.6 billion in 2019 for President Donald Trump's border wall.
articles.content: “We are for strong border security,” Schumer said, adding, “The $1.6 billion for border security negotiated by Democrats and Republicans is our position. We believe that is the right way to go … Stick to the $1.6 billion … We’re not negotiating in the press. … [+4350 chars]

articles.author: Nate Church
articles.title: Gamer Overhears Alleged Rape While Playing Online
articles.description: While playing Grand Theft Auto, an anonymous 16-year-old heard Daniel Enrique Fabian, 18, allegedly rape an underage girl.
articles.content: The unidentified witness was in a multiplayer lobby with the suspect on June 28, when he said Fabian told him he was going to “smash” the girl at his house — common parlance for sexual intercourse. Fabian then set down his headset to get up from the game, but… [+953 chars]
